seniority_level.evidence: Title doesn't specify seniority but responsibilities include implementing predictive models, designing enterprise applications, and working with big data - indicates mid-level complexity without explicit senior markers

job_family.evidence: Title is Data Engineer-Data Warehouse, core focus on data pipelines, ETL, data gathering, storage, and processing

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions both batch and real-time processing but emphasizes DBT, ETL tools, data integration, and federation - primary focus on ETL pipelines

leadership_expectation.evidence: Collaborative environment mentioned but no direct reports, hiring, or people management responsibilities - pure individual contributor role

primary_cloud.evidence: No specific cloud providers mentioned (AWS, Azure, GCP), only general tools like Linux, SQL, Python, Spark, Hadoop that can be on-premise or multi-cloud

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned at all

processing_paradigm.evidence: Explicitly mentions 'both batch and real-time processing' in job description

orchestrator_category.evidence: DBT is listed as required skill with 'Good Hands-on experience in DBT is required'

storage_layer.evidence: Title specifically mentions 'Data Warehouse' and Snowflake is listed as preferred technology

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as 'Kochi, Kerala, India' with onsite work model - requires being in India

timezone_focus.evidence: Specific location in Kochi, Kerala, India indicates India timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite role in specific location (Kochi, Kerala, India) would require relocation if not already resident there

h1b_friendly.evidence: H1B is US visa not applicable for Indian role, visa sponsorship stated as 'not_mentioned'

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: OPT/CPT are US student visa programs not applicable for Indian role

citizenship_required.evidence: Indian role would require work authorization in India, no specific citizenship requirements mentioned

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Standard IBM full-time position suggests employment contract rather than contractor arrangement

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in job description despite being IBM role

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No mention of career paths, growth opportunities, or advancement tracks in job description

mentorship_signals.evidence: Collaborative environment mentioned but no specific mentorship programs or learning from senior staff

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion, advancement, or career growth opportunities

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring different roles

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks mentioned in job description

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between 'Required Technical And Professional Expertise' and 'Preferred Technical And Professional Experience' with specific technical must-haves

scope_definition.evidence: Focused specifically on data engineering responsibilities, not multi-role hybrid position

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills required (DBT, Java, Python, Scala, ETL, etc.) are appropriate for data engineer role without unrealistic combinations
